title: Centered Grid Layout Mastery
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of grid centering using CSS. You will learn how to horizontally and vertically center a child element within a parent element using the grid layout. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to use justify-content and align-items properties to create a perfectly centered layout.
